servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0342: Camshaft Position Sensor “A” Circuit Low Bank 1 or Single Sensor

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 1 / intake side) signal voltage is unchanged from low level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

ptxt.emph: P0343: Camshaft Position Sensor “A” Circuit High Bank 1 or Single Sensor

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 1 / intake side) signal voltage is unchanged from high level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

ptxt.emph: P0347: Camshaft Position Sensor “A” Circuit Low Bank 2

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 2 / intake side) signal voltage is unchanged from low level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

ptxt.emph: P0348: Camshaft Position Sensor “A” Circuit High Bank 2

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 2 / intake side) signal voltage is unchanged from high level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

ptxt.emph: P0367: Camshaft Position Sensor “B” Circuit Low Bank 1

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 1 / exhaust side) signal voltage is unchanged from low level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

ptxt.emph: P0368: Camshaft Position Sensor “B” Circuit High Bank 1

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 1 / exhaust side) signal voltage is unchanged from high level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

ptxt.emph: P0392: Camshaft Position Sensor “B” Circuit Low Bank 2

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 2 / exhaust side) signal voltage is unchanged from low level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

ptxt.emph: P0393: Camshaft Position Sensor “B” Circuit High Bank 2

entry.ptxt: CMP sensor (bank 2 / exhaust side) signal voltage is unchanged from high level for specified crankshaft revolutions.

s1.ptxt: Run engine at idle speed for 1 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: CMP sensor power supply circuit check

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, disconnect connector from CMP sensor related to DTC.
Check for proper terminal connection to CMP sensor connector.
If connections are OK, turn ignition switch to ON position.
Check that voltage between CMP sensor power supply circuit (A1, B1, C1, or D1) and vehicle body ground is 5 V.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check that voltage between CMP sensor power supply circuit (A1, B1, C1 or D1) and ground circuit (A3, B3, C3 or D3) is 5 V.

paragroup.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.
If this DTC is detected again, go to Step 7.

testgroup.title: CMP sensor power supply circuit check

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, disconnect connectors from ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that CMP sensor power supply circuit is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of CMP sensor power supply circuit (A1, B1, C1 or D1) is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance between CMP sensor power supply circuit and vehicle body ground is infinity.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between CMP sensor power supply circuit terminal and other terminal at CMP sensor wire connector.
Circuit voltage of CMP sensor power supply circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch turned ON.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, disconnect connectors from ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that CMP sensor signal circuit (A2, B2, C2 or D2) is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each CMP sensor signal circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance between CMP sensor signal circuit and vehicle body ground is infinity.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between CMP sensor signal circuit terminal and other terminal at CMP sensor connector.
Circuit voltage of each CMP sensor signal circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch turned ON.

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

test1.ptxt: Check CMP sensor related to DTC.

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) detected at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
